titleStmt.title: Elegie on the much to be lamented death of the Right Honourable, Alexander Lord Reath, one of his Majesties most honourable Privy Council, and Exchequer, &c. Departed this life, March 21 1698.
titleStmt.author: Donaldson, James, fl. 1697-1713.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
